mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO at_store_tran_entry ( FID, FEntryID, FDBType, FMaterialID, FMaterialNumber, FMaterialName, FMaterialTypeNumber, FMaterialTypeName, FUnit, FQty, FOutStockID, FOutStockNumber, FOutStockName, FInStockID, FInStockNumber, FInStockName, FBatch, FRate, FInPrice, FInAmount, FNote ) VALUES ( #{FID}, #{FEntryID}, #{FDBType}, #{FMaterialID}, #{FMaterialNumber}, #{FMaterialName}, #{FMaterialTypeNumber}, #{FMaterialTypeName}, #{FUnit}, #{FQty}, #{FOutStockID}, #{FOutStockNumber}, #{FOutStockName}, #{FInStockID}, #{FInStockNumber}, #{FInStockName}, #{FBatch}, #{FRate}, #{FInPrice}, #{FInAmount}, #{FNote} )

INSERT IGNORE INTO at_store_tran_entry ( FID, FEntryID, FDBType, FMaterialID, FMaterialNumber, FMaterialName, FMaterialTypeNumber, FMaterialTypeName, FUnit, FQty, FOutStockID, FOutStockNumber, FOutStockName, FInStockID, FInStockNumber, FInStockName, FBatch, FRate, FInPrice, FInAmount, FNote ) VALUES
( #{item.FID}, #{item.FEntryID}, #{item.FDBType}, #{item.FMaterialID}, #{item.FMaterialNumber}, #{item.FMaterialName}, #{item.FMaterialTypeNumber}, #{item.FMaterialTypeName}, #{item.FUnit}, #{item.FQty}, #{item.FOutStockID}, #{item.FOutStockNumber}, #{item.FOutStockName}, #{item.FInStockID}, #{item.FInStockNumber}, #{item.FInStockName}, #{item.FBatch}, #{item.FRate}, #{item.FInPrice}, #{item.FInAmount}, #{item.FNote} )
